hero.description: From complex aerospace components to high-volume industrial parts, we deliver precision-machined solutions that meet the most demanding specifications. Your vision, engineered to perfection.

home.servicesSubtitle: From prototypes to production runs, we deliver quality machined components with consistency and precision.
home.whyChooseSubtitle: We combine decades of machining expertise with modern technology to deliver exceptional results.
home.industriesSubtitle: Trusted by leading companies across diverse sectors for mission-critical components.
home.readyToStartDesc: Send us your drawings and specifications. Our engineering team will provide a detailed quote within 48 hours.

services.cncMillingDesc: High-precision 3, 4, and 5-axis milling for complex geometries and tight tolerances.
services.cncMillingDescLong: High-precision 3, 4, and 5-axis milling for complex geometries and tight tolerances. Our advanced milling centers handle everything from simple prismatic parts to complex aerospace components.
services.cncTurningDesc: Multi-axis turning centers for rotational parts with live tooling capabilities.
services.cncTurningDescLong: Multi-axis turning centers with live tooling for complete rotational parts in a single setup. Ideal for shafts, bushings, and complex turned components.
services.rapidPrototypingDesc: Fast turnaround prototypes to validate designs before full production.
services.rapidPrototypingDescLong: Fast turnaround prototypes to validate designs before full production. Get functional metal prototypes in as little as 3-5 business days.
services.qualityInspectionDesc: CMM inspection and comprehensive quality documentation for all parts.
services.qualityInspectionDescLong: Comprehensive quality inspection using CMM and optical measurement systems. Full documentation including FAI reports, material certs, and dimensional reports.
services.assemblyServicesDesc: Complete sub-assembly and final assembly services to reduce your supply chain complexity.
services.assemblyServicesDescLong: Complete sub-assembly and final assembly services to reduce your supply chain complexity. We can handle mechanical assembly, press-fitting, and functional testing.
services.surfaceFinishingDesc: Complete surface treatment options to meet your functional and aesthetic requirements.
services.surfaceFinishingDescLong: Complete surface treatment options to meet your functional and aesthetic requirements. From anodizing to powder coating, we handle it all.
services.pageSubtitle: From prototypes to production, we deliver precision-machined components that meet the most demanding specifications across industries.

about.pageSubtitle: From a small workshop to a leading precision machining facility, our journey has been defined by commitment to quality and customer satisfaction.
about.storyP1: EMAS Metal was founded in 2009 by mechanical engineers with a passion for precision manufacturing. What began as a modest workshop has grown into a state-of-the-art facility serving clients across Europe.
about.storyP2: Today, we operate from a modern 2,500m² facility equipped with the latest CNC technology. Our team of 50+ skilled professionals is dedicated to exceeding customer expectations.
about.coreValuesSubtitle: The principles that guide everything we do.
about.precisionDesc: Every micron matters. We pursue perfection in every component.
about.integrityDesc: Honest communication, transparent pricing, reliable delivery.
about.partnershipDesc: We view every client relationship as a long-term partnership.
about.innovationDesc: Continuously investing in technology to stay ahead.
about.certificationsSubtitle: Committed to the highest industry standards.
about.partnerWithUsDesc: Experience the EMAS Metal difference. Let's discuss your next project.

capabilities.pageSubtitle: State-of-the-art equipment and expertise to handle your most demanding precision machining requirements.
capabilities.equipmentSubtitle: Industry-leading CNC machines for precision and reliability.
capabilities.materialsSubtitle: Expertise across a wide range of engineering materials.
capabilities.tolerancesSubtitle: Precision levels to match your requirements.
capabilities.finishesSubtitle: Complete your parts with the right finish.
capabilities.complexProjectDesc: Our engineering team can help with DFM and material selection.
capabilities.beadBlastedDesc: Uniform matte texture, hides tool marks
capabilities.anodizingTypeIIDesc: Decorative anodizing for aluminum, various colors
capabilities.anodizingTypeIIIDesc: Hard anodizing for wear resistance, 50+ HRC

references.pageSubtitle: For over 15 years, we've been the precision manufacturing partner of choice for leading companies across Europe and beyond.
references.industriesSubtitle: Delivering precision components across diverse sectors.
references.ourClientsSubtitle: Proud to partner with leading companies worldwide.
references.testimonialQuote: EMAS Metal has been our go-to partner for precision components for over 5 years. Their quality is consistently excellent, and their team truly understands our requirements.
references.joinClients: Join Our Growing List of Satisfied Clients
references.joinClientsDesc: Experience the quality and reliability that keeps our clients coming back.

gallery.pageSubtitle: Explore our precision-machined components, state-of-the-art equipment, and modern manufacturing facility.
gallery.noItems: No items found in this category.
gallery.readyToSee: Ready to See Your Parts Made Here?
gallery.readyToSeeDesc: Send us your drawings and we'll provide a detailed quote within 48 hours.

contact.pageSubtitle: Ready to start your project? Have questions about our capabilities? We're here to help. Send us your drawings for a detailed quote.
contact.addressValue:
Industrial Zone A, Block 7
34956 Istanbul, Turkey
contact.formSubtitle: Fill out the form below and attach your technical drawings. We'll respond within 48 hours.
contact.projectPlaceholder: Describe your project, quantities, materials, tolerances, and timeline requirements...
contact.attachHelperText: Upload PDF, DWG, DXF, STEP, or image files (max 20MB)
contact.responseGuaranteeDesc: We understand that time is critical. That's why we commit to responding to all quote requests within 48 business hours, with detailed pricing and lead time information.
contact.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
contact.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message. We will get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.errorMessage: Failed to send message. Please try again.

footer.companyDesc: Delivering precision CNC machining solutions for industries worldwide. ISO 9001:2015 certified with over 15 years of manufacturing excellence.

common.precisionEngineeringDesc: Tolerances down to ±0.005mm with advanced metrology verification.
common.fastTurnaroundDesc: From quote to delivery in as little as 5 business days.
common.materialExpertiseDesc: Aluminum, steel, titanium, Inconel, plastics, and more.
common.readyToStartDesc: Send us your drawings for a detailed quote within 48 hours.
